sentences.english: Also a homegrown musical "Love U, Teresa" has returned to Beijing's Poly Theater.
sentences.chinese: 本土音樂劇《愛上鄧麗君》也回到北京的保利劇院。

sentences.english: Tere sa is my National Flower.
At many people's heart, Teresa Teng was still a legend.
sentences.chinese: 鄧麗君，相信在很多人心裏還是一個傳奇。

sentences.english: However it will be the first exhibition for the memory of Teresa Teng in the art field.
sentences.chinese: 而在藝術界策劃鄧麗君紀念主體展的應該是第一次。

sentences.english: He also has girlfriends like Teresa Teng, Brigitte Lin and Catherina Yim.
sentences.chinese: 他也有鄧麗君，林青霞和米雪這樣的女朋友。

sentences.english: At the age of seventeen, favorite Teresa Teng song.
sentences.chinese: 十七歲的時候，最愛聽鄧麗君的歌。
